title: Covid: US halves isolation time for asymptomatic infection
description: The Centres for Disease Control (CDC) recommends five days isolation for asymptomatic Covid cases.

title: Newcastle 'dangerously close' to being unable to field team as Wilson faces 'months' out
description: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe says his side are "dangerously close" to not being able to field a team for Thursday's game at Everton.

title: 'I didn't like it at all' - Rangnick unhappy despite Cavani earning point at Newcastle
description: Manchester United manager Ralf Rangnick admits he "did not like the performance at all" after seeing his error-strewn side salvage a point at struggling Newcastle.

title: US animal shelter shocked after 800 parakeets handed over
description: A Detroit animal shelter said the birds were handed over in a "very unhealthy situation".

title: India blocks foreign funding for Mother Teresa charity
description: Hindu hardliners have long accused the Catholic charity of trying to convert people to Christianity.

title: Price beats Huybrechts in sudden-death leg to reach last 16
description: Gerwyn Price beats Kim Huybrechts in a sudden-death leg to reach the last 16 in PDC World Darts Championship at Alexandra Palace.

title: No new Covid rules in England before new year - Javid
description: The health secretary's comments come as England reported a record 113,628 cases on Christmas Day.

title: Harlequins go third after beating Northampton in feisty Twickenham thriller
description: Harlequins, the 2021 Premiership champions, end a memorable year by edging to victory over gutsy Northampton at Twickenham.

title: US snowstorms: California and other western states battered
description: Almost 30in (76cm) of snow fall in parts of northern California and Nevada over 24 hours.

title: Afghanistan's Taliban ban long-distance road trips for solo women
description: Afghanistan's rulers say a male relative must accompany women travelling more than 45 miles (72km).

title: Shoppers shun Christmas sales as footfall drops amid Covid fears
description: New data reveals a 32% decline in footfall compared with 2019, with central London badly affected.

title: No new Covid rules to be announced in England on Monday
description: The PM is being briefed on the latest Covid data soon, after two days without published figures.

title: Covid: Travel chaos spills into new week
description: More than 1,400 flights are scrapped on Monday, capping off a tough festive period for travellers.

title: Glasgow v Edinburgh off because of Covid outbreak
description: The 1872 Cup derby between Glasgow Warriors and Edinburgh on Monday has been postponed as a result of a Covid-19 outbreak in the home club's squad.

title: Oxford river swimmers criticise Christmas Day sewage release
description: Thames Water says sewage release is "sometimes necessary" to prevent flooding.

title: Amber Heard names new dog after Australian minister embroiled in feud
description: The US actress names her new dog after the Australian minister who said her dogs should go home in 2015.

title: Desmond Tutu - the staunch and steadfast healer of a nation

title: Energy prices: Government must show more urgency, says Ovo boss
description: Ovo predicts an "enormous crisis" in 2022 as the business secretary meets with the energy industry.

title: Jean-Marc Vallée: Canadian filmmaker dies aged 58
description: The director's works included Dallas Buyers Club, Wild and the TV series Big Little Lies.

title: The Ashes highlights: Late wickets put Australia on the brink of Ashes win

title: Windsor Castle: Queen 'assassination' bid video probed
description: The footage appears to show a person holding a crossbow saying they wanted to assassinate the Queen.

description: England are facing Ashes defeat after a dramatic second day of the third Test in Melbourne sees England close on 31-4 - still 51 runs behind Australia.

title: Covid: PM to look at England data as rules change in rest of UK
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Monday morning.

title: The Ashes: Nightwatchman Jack Leach out playing no shot

title: Dalian Atkinson: Police apologise for killing black ex-footballer

title: Prostate screening could be ready in five years

title: Covid-19: India's unwinnable battle against spitting
